attributes.action: Allow weddings at registry offices already scheduled in second lockdown
attributes.additional_details: For a lot of people this will be already their second or third wedding date and they are being penalised for others flaunting the rules. If its safe for funerals to go ahead, a wedding of at least 5 people should be safe too. I get not scheduling new ceremonies but please can the ones already booked go ahead!
attributes.background: Allow wedding ceremonies at registry offices that are already scheduled to go ahead in second lockdown.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Permit weddings of 5 people (registrar/couple/2 witnesses) during COVID19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315627

Allow wedding ceremonies and receptions to take place with social distancing
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329363
